Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: It is rare that a bar or restaurant lives up to so many good reviews but Caf√© De Dokter really does. The owners are very welcoming and make you feel at home straight away. It is a small space but I see it as a positive, as like we did you ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Absolutely stellar place to get a drink. The hospitality was amazing

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text:
Was surprised by the good Rating.
Staff was rude and unfriendly. Maybe she didn't like the way we look or something. We couldn't see any staff for two minutes, walked in and suddenly she yelled at us what we are doing here, so we left.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: 6th generation bar owned by lovely couple, great drink selection with an intimate atmosphere that felt right out of the 1940s

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: A small cozy bar with such a great vibe. You feel the history of this bar as soon as you walk in! Also one of the best gin I've ever tasted!

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Great place, really cozy with an authentic atmosphere! The bartender is very charming and the local regulars  is friendly and welcoming. A must-go-visit when in Amsterdam!

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Beautiful little Brown Cafe with a very friendly barman. Perfect for Jenever time.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: This place couldn't possibly have more character. The dust has dust on it, but in the best way possible. When you're there, you think, "I must soak every amazing second up, and remember how wonderful it is." Classic jazz albums fill the ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Had a blast playing cards and drinking amber ale in September 2016. The owner is so friendly and the atmosphere is charmingly magical.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Very small, intimate whiskey room. Good selection, but very little seating. You're not there to sit though, so enjoy the vintage atmosphere. Great place to stop by. Will be adding it to places I come to regularly, when in Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Fabulous location overlooking the dock with boats tied up just across the road. Not too many dockers at present but a wide range of customers enjoy this historic and quaint pub. Friendly staff offering traditional bar snacks in addition to a good range of beers and other drinks.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Nevermind the beer comments,  this is the best Scotch bar in Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: One of my favourite bars in Amsterdam !

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: The smallest bar in Amsterdam, and one of the oldest family owned bars. Has been in the family for centuries, please do ask the owner he loves to share his stories. Must visit for a great beer during your trip in the Netherlands.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Best Old-school Dutch brown Cafe.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Always go here when I am in Amsterdam. Great athmosphere, great owner, great jazz music, great beer. The decorations is amazing you feel like walking into a 100 year old bar

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text:
Great little sidewalk cafe, with plenty of great drinks available.

Be forewarned, though: it‚Äôs cash-only.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text:

Lovely, experienced Barman / owner. Small range of beers. Had the Deutche ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: The oldest cafe I ever visited! A time travel experience.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: A trip back in time! This pub is awesome and so is the music. It's been around since 1798 and it shows. Make sure to talk to the owner. He is a great gentleman. Really enjoyed my experience.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text:
The oldest bar in AMSTERDAM.
A must visit, and a priceless experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: I didn't have a very good experience with them. I went there many times during their open hours only to find it close every single time with no signs whether they were on vacation or why they were closed. When I finally went there I was ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Cafe De Dokter is truly such a cool experience. I would definitely recommend this establishment. It's incredibly cramped quarters, but that aspect just adds to the vibe. All the decor is antiquated and in most cases dusty, but that just adds to the vibe as well. You owe it to yourself to find your way to this hole in the wall.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Cosy & quirky brown cafe, our favourite bar in Amsterdam! The owner is lovely and there is a great selection of beers. We come back here every time.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Greatest bar of all time. Jazz on vinyl, good cold beers, great wine, whiskey, bartender is super friendly and knowledgeable. Will be returning.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Charming intimate and personable atmosphere. Vintage feel tops off the wonderful service. It‚Äôs a hidden gem worth writing home about!

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: such an experience! must visit for a beer!!

Name: Caf√© de Dokter

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Perfect Jazz Caf√©, tap beer was so awesome!

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Best bar in Amsterdam! Super small and cozy, jazz music playing from vinil discs, nice atmosphere, super nice owner, etc. And adding to this all, they have good beer

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: My favourite bar in the whole world. Its a very small bar with a great atmosphere. People from different places around the world. I will be visiting this weekend from the UK  12-Jan-2018 - 14-Jan-2018 and cant wait ! :)

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text:
Great old bar. The doctor himself is still creating new drinks in here.
They don't clean above shoulder height, so don't go in here if you're afraid of a little dust.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Really excellent. Nice music, really pleasant guy working there. Good selection of whisky and spirits with some real treasures on the shelves here and there.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: Really relaxed warm atmosphere and full of character. The they have a great choice of beers  too. I'd definitely recommend De Dokter, it's just lovely.

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: There is no other pub in Amsterdam with a more welcoming tender with fairer prices and interesting atmosphere. I have visited Amsterdam twice in three years and the stand out memory was this pub highly recommended

Name: Caf√© de Dokter
Review Text: The most beautiful bar ever. Lovely music. Lovely barowner. One of the highpeaks in my Amsterdam trip. You must go there.
